title: 9/29/2015: Variety: Retro active
content: He rose to fame with the remixed versions of retro hits like ‘Khoya khoya chand’ (Kala Bazaar; 1960), ‘Hawa hawai’ (Mr India; 1987) and the more recent, ‘Fifi’ (CID; 1956). Even singer-composer Mikey McCleary’s upcoming album features reprised versions...
